channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-use-fstring (1.2.1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin for string formatting style.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-eradicate (1.2)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to find commented out code
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-markdown (0.3)
item.description: Lints Python code blocks in Markdown files using flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-use-fstring (1.2)
item.description: Flake8 plugin for string formatting style.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-broken-line (0.4)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to forbid backslashes for line breaks
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-quotes (3.3.1)
item.description: Flake8 lint for quotes.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-nb (0.3.1)
item.description: Flake8 based checking for jupyter notebooks
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: darglint (1.8.1)
item.description: A utility for ensuring Google-style docstrings stay up to date with the source code.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-isort (4.1.1)
item.description: flake8 plugin that integrates isort .
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-implicit-concat (0.3.1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin that forbids implicit str/bytes literal concatenations
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-commas (2.1)
item.description: Flake8 lint for trailing commas.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-docstring-checker (1)
item.description: A simple flake8 plugin that checks if everything has a docstring
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-tuple-trailing-commas (0.1.4)
item.description: flake8 plugin for enforcing few rules
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-types (1.3)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to ban type hints.

item.title: Updated: flake8-literal (1.2)
item.description: Flake8 string literal validation
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-pep420 (1.2)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to ban PEP-420 implicit namespace packages.

item.title: Updated: flake8-noqa (1.2)
item.description: Flake8 noqa comment validation

item.description: the modular source code checker: pep8 pyflakes and co

item.description: A flake8 plugin that helps you write tidier imports.

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (21.9.2)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)
